chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
  He excels in hospitality. <break time="500ms"/> In this place, he served God for many years, dedicating himself day and night to vigils, prayers, and fasting. <break time="500ms"/> He strived for patience and, above all, hospitality, which he practiced whenever he could. <break time="500ms"/> While he excelled in all virtues of the soul, hospitality was considered his own special and unique virtue.
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
Hospitate excellit. 5. In hoc itaque loco annis multis Deo servivit,
vacans die noctuque vigiliis, orationibus et jejuniis,
studens patientiae et praecipue hospitalitati, quam
ita omni tempore secundum vires suas exercuit, ut
cum virtutibus animi cunctis polleret, hanc ut propriam
 et singularem habere putaretur.
